title: Cobell Undergraduate Scholarship
full_description: The Cobell Undergraduate Scholarship is administered by the Indigenous Education, Inc. on behalf of the Cobell Scholarship family. This scholarship is available to American Indian and Alaska Native undergraduate students who are pursuing degrees in vocational, technical, or undergraduate programs.
short_description: Undergraduate scholarship for American Indian and Alaska Native students
eligibility: Must be enrolled as a full-time undergraduate student; Must have a minimum 3.0 GPA; Must be an enrolled member of a federally recognized tribe; Must be pursuing a degree in an accredited institution
